idea: We are IT System integrator. Our primary focus in on Government Business i.e. Business opportunities from GeM and other eprocurement tender portals. We majorly deal in Desktops, Laptops, Printers, Servers, Networking devices, Storage and back-up devices, CCTV surveillance, Fire alarm, access controllers, Audio/Video solutions.
name: AZPIRE SMART TECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
According to industry studies, India's meat market is close to $30-$35 billion

and is increasing at an annual rate of around 18-20 percent. This suggests

that more than 70 percent of the Indian population consumes meat. In recent

years, the start-up ecosystem has influenced a shift in the meat selling

business and captured a significant portion of the meat delivery market.

In India, however, the market for meat delivery is still dominated by

unorganised meat merchants, who control about 99 percent of the area. In

the past, people have purchased meat from local butcher shops, sacrificing

on quality and convenience. The majority of them are still unaware that meat

purchased from butcher shops is sold in an unsanitary way and is not fresh

and of poor quality. The meat offered in conventional butcher shops is

exposed to environmental contaminants and insects like flies.

There is no uniformity of price, quality, and freshness in the conventional

meat-selling sector.

The unorganised players adhere to an inefficient supply chain, which

decreases the quality of the products and renders them unfit for human

consumption. According to scientists, India's meat has the greatest

concentration of antibiotics. Low investments are made in both the meat

business and the rearing of cattle for meat production. Infrastructure

inadequacy is another key challenge.

In the last several years, urban customers have gradually shifted towards

purchasing meat online due to considerations such as convenience and the

ability to receive fresh and clean meat at their doorstep. Online meat-selling

startups have altered how India purchases meat. These companies provide

custom-cut, marinated, and ready-to-cook meat items, which is a blessing

for those who wish to have a non-vegetarian dinner at home without the

trouble of preparing it.


Doordash will prepare the meat in order to provide raw fish, chicken,

mutton, eggs, ready-to-cook food, spreads, MOMOs, and cold cuts (including

ham, salami, and sausage). The processing of meat helps to maintain its

freshness, convenience, appearance, palatability, and safety, and it also

offers customers a diverse selection of meat products from which to choose.

Not only do industries that process meat add value to the product and

lengthen its shelf life, but they also contribute to the efficient management

of quality, which allows for the production of meat and meat products that

are of higher quality at a lower price on a local level. Increasing the

availability of food at periods when it would not normally be accessible, so

helping to increase overall food security.
name: DOORDASH FOODS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: COUNTRY WASTE & RECYCLING SOLUTION PRIVATE LIMITED is an urban infrastructure company with emphasized focus in the field of Municipal Solid Waste Management. Our mission is to secure and partnering in various waste management projects with the government, municipal corporations and private companies to collect, handle, segregate, process, treat and scientifically dispose the municipal waste generated in their domain aiming at cleaner, greener and healthier environment.
name: COUNTRY WASTE & RECYCLING SOLUTION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
At BeyondIRR, our vision is to empower financial advisors so that they can deliver better experience to their wealth clients. We intend to assist them with technology driven capabilities and provide them with timely insights on markets, investment products as well as client portfolios. BeyondIRR is building the go-to platform for such investment specialists.


Using BeyondIRR's technology platform, investment specialists would be able to grow their wealth business multi-fold as they can run their business more efficiently and effectively.They can get access to all the complex pieces of the investment world at one single place which would help them stay ahead in the highly competitive wealth management space. Doing wealth management or wealth distribution business will become much more simpler and would motivate new talent to join the wealth industry.


https://www.beyondirr.tech/
name: BeyondIRR
